Class modifyPartFormController

java.lang.Object
controller.modifyPartFormController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class modifyPartFormController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class is the controller for the ModifyPartForm.

  • Method Details

    • onActionSwitchInHouse

      public void onActionSwitchInHouse​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method changes the text of the label machIDCompanyNameLbl to machineId when inHouse is selected.
      Parameters:
      event - fires when the radio button inHouse is selected/clicked.

    • onActionSwitchOutsourced

      public void onActionSwitchOutsourced​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method changes the text of the label machIDCompanyNameLbl to Company Name when the outsourced button is selected.
      Parameters:
      event - fires when the radio button outSourced is selected/clicked.

    • onActionCancel

      public void onActionCancel​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws java.io.IOException
      This method returns the user to the main menu.
      Parameters:
      event - fires when the cancel button is pressed on the AddPartForm in the GUI.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - If the file cannot be read.

    • onActionUpdate

      public void onActionUpdate​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws java.io.IOException
      This method updates an index in Inventory's allParts list.
      Parameters:
      event - fires when the save button is clicked.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - If file cannot be read.

    • switchViews

      public void switchViews​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event, java.lang.String fileLocation) throws java.io.IOException
      This method switches the view from the addPartForm to the specified file location.
      Parameters:
      event - fires when the cancel or save buttons are clicked and the proper conditions are met.
      fileLocation - What scene will be shown to the user.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - If the file is not read.

    • setText

      public void setText​(int index, Part part)
      This method is used to pass data between forms. It serves to load the text fields with the selected part's data.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the part in allParts
      part - The selected part

    • initialize

      public void initialize​(java.net.URL url, java.util.ResourceBundle rb)
      This method implements from javafx.fxml.Initializable. Fills the rows of the part and associated parts tables.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - The url
      rb - The resource bundle
